channel.title: CDS on WTF - the terminal dashboard
channel.description: Recent content in CDS on WTF - the terminal dashboard

item.title: CDS Favorites
item.description: Display runs of you CDS favorites workflows. Configuration Copy cdsFavorites: enabled: true position: top: 0 left: 0 height: 2 width: 2 refreshInterval: 8 apiURL: https://api.cds.localhost.local token: xxxxxxxxxxxx hideTags: - "git.repository" - "git.hash" - "triggered_by" Attributes Name Description Value `apiURL` Your CDS API URL. `token` Your CDS Consumer Token. `hideTags` A CDS Runs can have many "

item.title: CDS Queue
item.description: Display current CDS queue - waiting or building jobs. Configuration Copy cdsQueue: enabled: true position: top: 0 left: 0 height: 3 width: 2 refreshInterval: 8 apiURL: https://api.cds.localhost.local token: xxxxxxxxxxxx Attributes Name Description Value `apiURL` Your CDS API URL. Consumer token scope used: RUN `token` Your CDS Consumer Token. border Optional Whether or not to draw this widget with a border.

item.title: CDS Status
item.description: Display current CDS status. This is useful for CDS Administrator only. Configuration Copy cdsStatus: enabled: true position: top: 0 left: 0 height: 3 width: 2 refreshInterval: 8 apiURL: https://api.cds.localhost.local token: xxxxxxxxxxxx Attributes Name Description Value `apiURL` Your CDS API URL. `token` Your CDS Consumer Token. border Optional Whether or not to draw this widget with a border.
